metadata.name: OSACompile Run-Only Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential suspicious run-only executions compiled using OSACompile

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osacompile')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -x ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')))

output.summary: Detects potential suspicious run-only executions compiled using OSACompile

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://redcanary.com/blog/applescript/, https://ss64.com/osx/osacompile.html
